answers.answer: How is the baby?.never heard of that syndrome b4. Whats causes it.
H-hemolysis, EL-elevated liver enzymes, LP-low platelets

They say that she's doing real good to be born that early that they never seen nun like it. Some of the things I was having was back pains just on the right side of my back that will tight up n chest pain n a real bad head ach that didnt go away
So hows is ur baby..? Its everything ok? How big she is? Im 27 weeks im just wondering. .

To be honest I was just gone go home n get a lil rest n go to sleep. Because I was saying to my self they wasn't gone do anything but check me n send me back home. Come to find out my blood pressure was up 181/102. The doctors said good I came because me n the baby was n serious trouble
C section hurt bad y'all not trying to scare anyone but I did not see this coming at all because she suppose to came December 27 2014
Thanks god u guys fine...I just have a call from my doctor today that I have a gestational diebetes..thats already make me nervous. .
Everything gone work out just find I'll have u n ur little one on my pray line as well.
Congrats I hope u guys live life as God intended.
Thank you mizzpoohbear..im having a girl too:)..pray for u as well..for fast recovery

I Had HELLP with my first pregnancy, like you I just thought I needed to rest & all of a sudden I had to have emergency cs at 32 weeks. My daughter was 2lbs, 14oz. Shes still small at almost 2 years old, but we haven't had any long term issues from her being preemie. Try to focus on skin to skin (kangaroo care) in the hospital & pump for her even if they have to supplement. Good luck on your new baby! If you have any questions let me know!
Ok thank u ladies I so love this app.

Awww thank goodness you and baby are well. Hope she gets to go home quick and I hope you have a awesome recovery ;) I'm due December 27th also and wow you beat me to it but luckily she's doing fine.  Get some rest momma and congrats. ;)

Hello is linked to high blood pressure and preeclampsia. The only cure is delivery of the fetus but it is a fine line between what is good for mom and what is good for baby. The low platelets are the most concerning thing. Anyways, good luck.

question: Hey ladies, well yday was the big day for me. Have u ladies heard of the hellp syndrome? Well I'm 28 weeks. I got up yday morning doing my morning routine getting my 3yr old together n me ready to go to work mind u ladies head hurting as well. So wen I got to work about 8:20 am I asked my supervisor could I leave at 11am because my head wouldn't stop hurting I drove my self at the women hospital at 11:30 n guess wat they had to do an emergency c section on me had her at 425pm
title: hellp syndrome
